name: Universal scale cleaner (100g)
description: Chemical solution for cleaning bathroom floors, scale on water cooker, etc. Food grade and non toxic (DO NOT DRINK). Mix 1:3 with hot water

name: Oleophobic Coating (Phone)
description: Restores fingerprint resistance, smoothness and water repellency. Only purchase if water sticks to your screen. Lasts up to 6 months.

name: Oleophobic Coating (Tablet)
description: Restores fingerprint resistance, smoothness and water repellency. Only purchase if water sticks to your screen. Lasts up to 6 months.

name: Isopropanol (500ml)
description: Isopropyl alcohol for cleaning electronic devices and surfaces.

name: Spray bottle (50ml)
description: Plastic spray bottle to hold chemicals

name: Spray bottle (100ml)
description: Plastic spray bottle to hold chemicals (larger)

name: Benedicts solution (50ml)
description: Test solution for detecting reducing sugars.

name: Sulfuric acid 20% w/w (50ml)
description: Dilute sulfuric acid for chemical experiments.

name: DEET Insect Repellent (70ml)
description: 99% pure DEET insect repellent for outdoor use. Dilute with water before use.

name: Hydrogen peroxide 10% (50ml)
description: 10% h2o2. Customisable concentration available on request.
